attributes.action: consider the legendary Bruce Forsyth, star of Come Dancing and The Generation Game, to be knighted for his services to  showbiz and entertainment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bruce Forsyth is a national institution. He has been in British show business for most of his life. Bruce is now approaching 81 and yet this achievement has been largely unrecognised. His manner, and humour is appealing to all and timeless. He is part of the Great British tradition of theatre and stage. An art form in decline.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
